docs.text: Welcome to Mozz Docs  For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands  mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout  mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Adding documentation content  Just to check out how this works...
docs.title: Home

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.text: PowerShell  Scripts  PowerShell scripts are saved as *.ps1 files. Example script: Get-Service | ? {$_.Name -match "Xbox"} Note Please don't use Where. Use either ? or Where-Object instead. Warning Where is an alias of Where-Object but your code is cleaner if you use Where-Object. Modules  PowerShell modules are saved as *.psm1 files. More  If you want to learn more about Python instead, click here.
docs.title: PowerShell
